name: Rogue Spirit (Dalcubierre)
description:
Rogue Spirit will be an old school arcade shooter.This is the first level demo, and it is still in working progress.Created with the Arcade Game Studio of Bruno R. MarcosMusic credits: http://freemusicarchive.org/music/fasterbaby/[CURSORS,D,S,A] Default game controls
[`] (Between ESC TAB) Cicle seven scanlines modes (Mode 0 removes the scanlines)
+,- Change brightness
[F10] Change screen mode (on title screen)
[F11] Full screen (on title screen)
[ESC] Exit game mode to menu (To exit game and redefine controls)Hope you like and comment.Thank you.
